nodes.text: Landing platform FF-887 was a landing platform on the planet Coruscant. When the Corellian smuggler Han Solo and his Wookiee co-pilot Chewbacca arrived on Coruscant shortly after the Battle of Yavin, their Star ship the Millennium Falcon, under the false name Thrall's Tale, was assigned to land there by Imperial Center flight control.

Landing platform FF-887 was first mentioned in the second issue of the comic book series titled simply Star Wars published by Dark Horse Comics. The issue was written by Brian Wood and released on February 13 2013.
